Package org.vraptor.interceptor

Interface Summary
UploadedFileInformation  
 

Class Summary
BasicUploadedFileInformation  
ComponentLookupInterceptor Looks up for the component and registers it in the logic context.
ExecuteLogicInterceptor The last interceptor: calls the logic method.
FlashScopeInterceptor The flash scope interceptor is responsible for managing the flash context within vraptor.
InjectionInterceptor Interceptor responsible for injection of dependencies on In annotations.
InterceptorDealer Deals with the list of interceptors to be executed.
InterceptorType Interceptor class to deal with interceptors instances
MultipartRequestInterceptor Interceptor capable of parsing the input stream.
OutjectionInterceptor Outjects.
RegisterAttributesInteceptor  
SettingAndValidationInterceptor Responsible for setters and validation.
ViewInterceptor The last interceptor of a LogicFlow.
 

Exception Summary
InterceptorInstantiationException Unable to instantiate an interceptor.
